item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress Service Datatype Description Local accountId The unique identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that owns the virtual IP address Type: integer connectionLimit The connection limit for this virtual IP address Type: integer connectionLimitUnits The units for the connection limit Type: string dedicatedFlag A flag that determines if a VIP is dedicated or not.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress_SecureTransportCipher
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress_SecureTransportCipher Datatype Description A single cipher configured for a load balancer virtual IP address instance. Instances of this class are immutable and should reflect a cipher that is configurable on a load balancer device. Local id Unique identifier for the cipher instance Type: integer keyName Identifier for the associated encryption algorithm Type: string virtualIpAddressId Identifier for the associated [[SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress (type)|virtual IP address]] instance Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress_SecureTransportProtocol
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress_SecureTransportProtocol Datatype Description Links a SSL transport protocol with a virtual IP address instance. Instances of this class are immutable and should reflect a protocol that is configurable on a load balancer device. Local id Unique identifier for the protocol instance Type: integer keyName Identifier for the associated communication protocol Type: string virtualIpAddressId Identifier for the associated [[SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress (type)|virtual IP address]] instance Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualServer
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualServer Service Datatype Description Local allocation Type: integer id Type: integer name Type: string notes Type: string port Type: integer routingMethodId Type: integer virtualIpAddressId Type: integer Relational routingMethod Type: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Routing_Method scaleLoadBalancers Collection of scale load balancers this virtual server applies to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_Type Datatype Description Local keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Backbone
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Backbone Service Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Network_Backbone represents a single backbone connection from SoftLayer to the public Internet, from the Internet to the SoftLayer private network, or a link that connects the private networks between SoftLayer’s datacenters. The SoftLayer_Network_Backbone data type is a collection of data associated with one of those connections. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Backbone::getObject SoftLayer_Network_Backbone::getAllBackbones Local capacity The numeric portion of the bandwidth capacity of a SoftLayer backbone.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Backbone_Location_Dependent
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Backbone_Location_Dependent Service Datatype Description Local dependentLocationId Type: integer id Type: integer sourceLocationId Type: integer Relational dependentLocation Type: SoftLayer_Location sourceLocation Type: SoftLayer_Location Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Usage
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Usage Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Usage data type contains specific information relating to bandwidth utilization at a specific point in time on a given network interface. Local amountIn Incoming bandwidth utilization. Type: decimal amountOut Outgoing bandwidth utilization. Type: decimal bandwidthUsageDetailTypeId ID of the bandwidth usage detail type for this record. Type: decimal Relational trackingObject The tracking object this bandwidth usage record describes.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Usage_Detail
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Usage_Detail Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Usage_Detail data type contains specific information relating to bandwidth utilization at a specific point in time on a given network interface. Local amountIn Incoming bandwidth utilization. Type: decimal amountOut Outgoing bandwidth utilization. Type: decimal bandwidthUsageDetailTypeId ID of the bandwidth usage detail type for this record. Type: decimal Relational account The account tied to this tracking object Type: SoftLayer_Account

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allocation
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allocation Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allocation data type contains general information relating to a single bandwidth allocation record. Local amount The amount of bandwidth allocated. Type: decimal id Internal ID associated with this allocation. Type: integer Relational allotmentDetail A bandwidth allotment detail. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment_Detail billingItem Billing item associated with this hardware allocation.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment class provides methods and data structures necessary to work with an array of hardware objects associated with a single Bandwidth Pooling. Local accountId The user account identifier associated with this allotment. Type: integer bandwidthAllotmentTypeId An identifier marking this allotment as a virtual private rack (1) or a bandwidth pooling(2). Type: integer createDate Creation date for an allotment.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment_Detail
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment_Detail Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment_Detail data type contains specific information relating to a single bandwidth allotment record. Local allocationId Allocated bandwidth. Type: integer bandwidthAllotmentId Bandwidth Pool associated with this detail. Type: integer effectiveDate Beginning this date the bandwidth allotment is active. Type: dateTime endEffectiveDate From this date the bandwidth allotment is no longer active.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment_Type contains a description of the associated SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment object. Local description Type: string id Type: integer keyName Type: string shortDescription Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Host Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Host type contains general information used to the route a server to its pod. Local podId Pod ID for this host device. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Interface
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Interface Datatype Description All bandwidth tracking is maintained through the switch that the bandwidth is used through. All bandwidth is stored in a “pod” repository. An interface links the hardware switch with the pod repository identification number. This is only relevant to bandwidth data. It is not common to use this. Local hostId A interface's host. The host stores the pod number for the bandwidth data.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage data type contains general information relating to a single bandwidth usage record. Local Relational bandwidthAllotmentDetail Bandwidth allotment detail for this hardware. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment_Detail bandwidthUsageDetail Bandwidth usage details for this hardware. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail[] Count bandwidthUsageDetailCount A count of bandwidth usage details for this hardware. Type: unsignedLong

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail data type contains specific information relating to bandwidth utilization at a specific point in time on a given network interface. Local amountIn Incoming bandwidth utilization . Type: decimal amountOut Outgoing bandwidth utilization . Type: decimal day Day and time this bandwidth utilization event was recorded. Type: dateTime Relational bandwidthUsage In and out bandwidth utilization for a specified time stamp.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail_Total
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail_Total Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Usage_Detail data type contains specific information relating to bandwidth utilization at a specific point in time on a given network interface. Local amountIn Incoming bandwidth utilization. Type: decimal amountOut Outgoing bandwidth utilization. Type: decimal bandwidthUsageDetailTypeId ID of the bandwidth usage detail type for this record. Type: decimal Relational account The account tied to this tracking object Type: SoftLayer_Account

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Usage_Detail_Type data type contains generic information relating to the types of bandwidth records available, currently just public and private. Local alias Database key associated with this bandwidth detail type. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Account Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Account data type models an individual CDN account. CDN accounts contain the SoftLayer account ID of the customer, the vendor ID the account belongs to, the customer ID provided by the vendor, and a CDN account’s status. Local Relational account SoftLayer account to which the CDN account belongs. Type: SoftLayer_Account billingItem An associated parent billing item which is active.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Behavior_Geoblocking
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Behavior_Geoblocking Service Datatype Description Local accessType Type: string regionType Type: string regions Type: array of strings status Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Behavior_Geoblocking_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Behavior_Geoblocking_Type Datatype Description Local accessType Type: array of strings continent Type: array of strings countryOrRegion Type: array of strings regionType Type: array of strings

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Behavior_HotlinkProtection
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Behavior_HotlinkProtection Service Datatype Description Local protectionType Type: string refererValues Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge Service Datatype Description This data type models a purge event that occurs in caching server. It contains a reference to a mapping configuration, the path to execute the purge on, the status of the purge, and flag that enables saving the purge information for future use. Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_TimeToLive
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_TimeToLive Service Datatype Description This data type models a purge event that occurs repetitively and automatically in caching server after a set interval of time. A time to live instance contains a reference to a mapping configuration, the path to execute the purge on, the result of the purge, and the time interval after which the purge will be executed. Local createDate date record is created Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Mapping
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Mapping Service Datatype Description This data type represents the mapping Configuration settings for enabling CDN services. Each instance contains a reference to a CDN account, and CDN configuration properties such as a domain, an origin host and its port, a cname we generate, a cname the vendor generates, and a status. Other properties include the type of content to be cached (static or dynamic), the origin type (a host server or an object storage account), and the protocol to be used for caching.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Mapping_Path
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Mapping_Path Service Datatype Description Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Metrics
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Metrics Service Datatype Description This Metrics class provides methods to get CDN metrics based on account or mapping unique id. Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Utils_Response
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Utils_Response Datatype Description Local code Type: integer message Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Vendor
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Vendor Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Vendor contains information regarding a CDN Vendor. This class is associated with SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Vendor_Attribute class. Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component Service Datatype Description Every piece of hardware running in SoftLayer’s datacenters connected to the public, private, or management networks (where applicable) have a corresponding network component. These network components are modeled by the SoftLayer_Network_Component data type. These data types reflect the servers’ local ethernet and remote management interfaces. External Links IP address at Wikipedia MAC address at Wikipedia Virtual LAN at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getNetworkComponents SoftLayer_Hardware::getPrimaryIpAddress SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getPublicNetworkComponent SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getPrivateNetworkComponent SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getManagementNetworkComponent SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getPrimaryIpAddress SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getPrivateIpAddress SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::setPublicPortSpeed SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::setPrivatePortSpeed SoftLayer_Network_Vlan::getNetworkComponents Local duplexModeId A network component's Duplex mode.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Duplex_Mode
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Duplex_Mode Datatype Description Duplex Mode allows finer grained control over networking options and settings. Local description Type: string keyname Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer network component firewall. This is the object which ties the running rules to a specific downstream server. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Rule Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Rule object type represents a currently running firewall rule and contains relative information. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia Local action The action that the rule is to take [permit or deny].

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Subnets
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Subnets Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Subnets object type represents the current linked subnets and contains relative information. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia Local applyServerRulesFlag A boolean flag that indicates whether the subnet should receive all the rules intended for the host on this context slot.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Group Datatype Description Local groupTypeId Type: integer Relational networkComponents A network component group's associated network components. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Component[] Count networkComponentCount A count of a network component group's associated network components. Type: unsignedLong

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_IpAddress Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_IpAddress data type contains general information relating to the binding of a single network component to a single SoftLayer IP address. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::getObject SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::editObject Local Relational ipAddress The IP address associated with this object's network component. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress networkComponent The network component associated with this object's IP address. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Component

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Network_Vlan_Trunk
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Network_Vlan_Trunk Datatype Description Represents the association between a Network_Component and Network_Vlan in the manner of a ‘trunk’. Trunking a VLAN to a port allows that ports to receive and send packets tagged with the corresponding VLAN number. External Links Virtual LAN at Wikipedia Local networkComponentId The network component's identifier. Type: integer networkVlanId The identifier of the network VLAN that is a trunk on the network component.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_RemoteManagement
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_RemoteManagement Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_RemoteManagement data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer remote management network component. Local duplexModeId A network component's Duplex mode. Type: string hardwareId The internal identifier of the hardware that a network component belongs to. Type: integer id A network component's internal identifier. Type: integer ipmiIpAddress The IP address of an IPMI-based management network component.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware data type abstracts information related to network connections between SoftLayer hardware and SoftLayer network components. It is populated via triggers on the network_connection table (SoftLayer_Network_Connection), so you shouldn’t have to delete or insert records into this table, ever. seeAlso SoftLayer_Hardware SoftLayer_Network_Component Local Relational hardware A network component uplink's connected [[SoftLayer_Hardware|Hardware]]. Type: SoftLayer_Hardware

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account data type models an individual CDN account. CDN accounts contain references to the SoftLayer customer account they belong to, login credentials for upload services, and a CDN account’s status. Please contact SoftLayer sales to purchase or cancel a CDN account External Links Content delivery network at Wikipedia CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account::getCdnAccounts SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getObject Local accountId The internal identifier of the customer account that a CDN account belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account_Status contains information on a CDN account. seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Local description A longer description of a CDN account's status. Type: string id A CDN account status' internal identifier. Type: integer name A CDN account status' name. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Address
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Address Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Address data type models an individual IP address that CDN allow or deny access from. Local accessType The type of access on an IP address. It can be "ALLOW" or "DENY" Type: string cdnAccountId The internal identifier of the CDN account Type: integer createDate The created date Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Token
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Token Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Address data type models an individual IP address that CDN allow or deny access from. Local cdnAccountId The internal identifier of a CDN account Type: integer clientIp The client IP address. This is optional. Type: string createDate The created date Type: dateTime name The customer id. You can use this optional value to tie a user id to an authentication token.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Customer_Subnet
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Customer_Subnet Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Customer_Subnet data type contains general information relating to a single customer subnet (remote). Local accountId The account id a customer subnet belongs to. Type: integer cidr A subnet's Classless Inter-Domain Routing prefix. This is a number between 0 and 32 signifying the number of bits in a subnet's netmask. These bits separate a subnet's network address from it's host addresses.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Customer_Subnet_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Customer_Subnet_IpAddress Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Customer_Subnet_IpAddress data type contains general information relating to a single Customer Subnet (Remote) IPv4 address. Local id Unique identifier for an ip address. Type: integer ipAddress An IP address expressed in dotted quad format. Type: string notes An IP address' user defined note. Type: string subnetId The unique identifier for the customer subnet (remote) the ip address belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_CloudExchangeProvider
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_CloudExchangeProvider Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_CloudExchangeProvider presents a structure containing attributes of a Direct Link Cloud exchange provider. Local id Type: integer name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_Location
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_Location Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_Location presents a structure containing attributes of a Direct Link location, and its related object SoftLayer location. Local buildingColocationOwner The Direct Link specific location owner for POP/DC facilities. Like Equinix, Pacnet, Verizon etc. Type: string id The unique identifier of a Direct Link location. Type: integer isRedundantXcr Specifies if The Direct Link specific location has Redundancy:secondary XCR availability.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_Provider
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_Provider Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_Provider presents a structure containing attributes of a Direct Link provider. Local id Type: integer name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_ServiceType
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_ServiceType Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_DirectLink_ServiceType presents a structure containing attributes of a Direct Link Service Type. Local id Type: integer type Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_AccessControlList
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_AccessControlList Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_AccessControlList data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer firewall access to controll list. This is the object which ties the running rules to a specific context. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Interface
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Interface Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Interface data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer firewall interface. This is the object which ties the firewall context access control list to a firewall. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Module_Context_Interface
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Module_Context_Interface Service Datatype Description Local id Type: integer name Type: string Relational firewallContextAccessControlLists Type: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_AccessControlList[] networkVlan Type: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan Count firewallContextAccessControlListCount A count of Type: unsignedLong

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template type contains general information for a SoftLayer network firewall template. Firewall templates are recommend rule sets for use with SoftLayer Hardware Firewall (Dedicated). These optimized templates are designed to balance security restriction with application availability. The templates given may be altered to provide custom network security, or may be used as-is for basic security. At least one rule set MUST be applied for the firewall to block traffic.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template_Rule Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Rule type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer firewall template rule. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Component Firewall]] service to view current rules. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia Local action The action that this template rule is to take [permit or deny]. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request data type contains information relating to a SoftLayer network firewall update request. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Component Firewall]] service to view current rules. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia Local applyDate Timestamp of when the rules from the update request were applied to the firewall.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Customer
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Customer Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Customer is a single update made by a customer to a ticket. Local applyDate Timestamp of when the rules from the update request were applied to the firewall. Type: dateTime authorizingUserId The unique identifier of the user that authorized the update request. Type: integer authorizingUserType The type of user that authorized the update request [EMP or USR].

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Employee
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Employee Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Employee data type returns a user object for the SoftLayer employee that created the request. Local applyDate Timestamp of when the rules from the update request were applied to the firewall. Type: dateTime authorizingUserId The unique identifier of the user that authorized the update request. Type: integer authorizingUserType The type of user that authorized the update request [EMP or USR].

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Rule Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Rule type contains information relating to a SoftLayer network firewall update request rule. This rule is a member of a [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]]. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Component Firewall]] service to view current rules. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia Local action The action that this update request rule is to take [permit or deny].

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Rule_Version6
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Rule_Version6 Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Update_Request_Rule_Version6 type contains information relating to a SoftLayer network firewall update request rule for IPv6. This rule is a member of a [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]]. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Component Firewall]] service to view current rules. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. Local action The action that this update request rule is to take [permit or deny].

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway Service Datatype Description Local accountId The internal identifier of the account assigned to this gateway. Type: integer groupNumber The VRRP group number for this gateway. This is set internally and cannot be provided on create. Type: integer id A gateway's internal identifier. Type: integer name A gateway's name. This is required on create and can be no more than 255 characters.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_Member
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_Member Service Datatype Description Local hardwareId The internal identifier of the hardware for this member. Type: integer id A gateway member's internal identifier. Type: integer networkGatewayId The internal identifier of the gateway this member belongs to. Type: integer priority The priority for this gateway member. This is set internally and cannot be provided on create.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_Member_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_Member_Attribute Service Datatype Description Local id A gateway member's internal identifier. Type: integer lastvSRXVersion The previous vSRX version of the gateway software Type: string memberId The gateway member for this attribute. Type: integer networkModel Network model of the gateway. Type: string password Password of the user name. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_Status Service Datatype Description Local description A gateway status's description. Type: string id A gateway status's internal identifier. Type: integer keyName A gateway status's programmatic name. Type: string name A gateway status's human-friendly name. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_VersionUpgrade
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_VersionUpgrade Service Datatype Description Local fromVersion Gateway version being upgraded from. Type: string id A gateway status's internal identifier. Type: integer toVersion Gateway version available for upgrade. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_Vlan
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Gateway_Vlan Service Datatype Description Local bypassFlag If true, this VLAN is bypassed. If false, it is routed through the gateway. Type: boolean id A gateway VLAN's internal identifier. Type: integer networkGatewayId The internal identifier of the gateway this VLAN is attached to. Type: integer networkVlanId The internal identifier of the network VLAN.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant Service Datatype Description Local accountId Type: integer bgpAsn Specifies ASN used for BGP. Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime errorMessage Type: string globalRoutingFlag The Direct Link connectivity to all SoftLayer data centers if globalRoutingFlag = 1 and local connectivity if globalRoutingFlag = 0. Type: boolean id Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_HealthMonitor type presents a structure containing attributes of a health monitor object associated with load balancer instance. Note that the relationship between backend (pool) and health monitor is N-to-1, especially that the pools object associated with a health monitor must have the same pair of protocol and port. Example: frontend FA: http, 80 - backend BA: tcp, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_tcp3456 frontend FB: https, 443 - backend BB: tcp, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_tcp3456 In above example both backends BA and BB share the same healthmonitor HM_tcp3456

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7HealthMonitor
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7HealthMonitor Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7HealthMonitor type presents a structure containing attributes of a health monitor object associated with a L7 pool instance. Note that the relationship between backend (L7 pool) and health monitor is 1-to-1, pools object associated with a health monitor must have the same pair of protocol and port. Example: frontend FA: http, 80 - backend BA: http, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_http3456 frontend FB: https, 443 - backend BB: http, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_http3456

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member represents the backend member for a L7 pool. It can be either a virtual server or a bare metal machine. Local address The IP address of a L7 pool member. Type: string createDate Type: dateTime id The ID of a L7 pool member. Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Policy
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Policy Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Policy represents the policy for a listener. Local action The Action to take if the rules belonging to this policy match. It can be set to any of the following values: REDIRECT_URL, REDIRECT_POOL, REJECT. Type: string createDate Specifies when a L7 Policy was created. Type: dateTime id The unique identifier of a policy.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Pool
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Pool Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Pool type presents a structure containing attributes of a load balancer’s L7 pool such as the protocol, and the load balancing algorithm used. L7 pool is used for redirect_pool action of the L7 policy and is different from the default pool seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Pool Local createDate Create date of the L7 pool instance Type: dateTime id Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7PoolMembersHealth
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7PoolMembersHealth Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7PoolMembersHealth provides statistics of members belonging to a particular L7 pool. Local l7PoolUuid Instance uuid of the L7 pool Type: string membersHealth Members statistics of the L7 pool Type: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_MemberHealth[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Rule Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Rule represents the Rules that can be attached to a a L7 policy. Local comparisonType Comparision type for the Rule, It should any of the following values : REGEX, STARTS_WITH, ENDS_WITH, CONTAINS, EQUAL_TO. Type: string createDate Specifies when a Rule was created Type: dateTime id The ID of a Rule. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7SessionAffinity
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7SessionAffinity Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7SessionAffinity represents the session affinity, aka session persistence, configuration for a load balancer backend L7 pool. Local type Type of the session persistence Type: string Relational l7Pool Type: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Pool Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Listener
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Listener Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Listener type presents a data structure for a load balancers listener, also called frontend. Local connectionLimit Limit of connections a listener can accept Type: integer createDate Specifies when the listener was created. Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Specifies when the listener was updated previously. Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancer
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancer Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancer type presents a structure containing attributes of a load balancer, and its related objects including listeners, pools and members. Local accountId The account this load balancer belongs to. Type: integer address Address (Host name) of a load balancer. Type: string createDate Specifies when a load balancer was created. Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerHealthMonitorConfiguration
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerHealthMonitorConfiguration Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerHealthMonitorConfiguration specifies the check method to be used for health monitoring backend members. Local backendPort Backends port Type: integer backendProtocol Type: string healthMonitorUuid Health Monitor UUID, required for update only Type: string interval Interval in seconds to perform Type: integer maxRetries Type: integer timeout Health check methods timeout in Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerMonitoringMetricDataPoint
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerMonitoringMetricDataPoint Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerMonitoringMetricDataPoint is a collection of datapoints retrieved from a load balancer instance. The available metrics are: The metric value The timestamp when the metric value was obtained Local epochTimestamp Epoch Time Type: integer value a value Type: decimal

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerProtocolConfiguration
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerProtocolConfiguration Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerProtocolConfiguration specifies the protocol, port, maximum number of allowed connections and session stickiness for load balancer’s front- and backend. Local backendPort Backends port Type: integer backendProtocol Type: string frontendPort Frontends port Type: integer frontendProtocol Type: string listenerUuid Listeners UUID, required for update only Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerServerInstanceInfo
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerServerInstanceInfo Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerServerInstanceInfo specifies the application server, usually an IBM SoftLayer virtual server or bare metal system, to be assigned to a load balancer. Local privateIpAddress Servers private IP address Type: string weight Load balancing weight for a server Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerStatistics
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerStatistics Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancerStatistics is a collection of metrics retrieved from a load balancer instance. The available metrics are: NUmber of members up Number of members down Total number of active connections Throughput Data processed by month Connection rate Local connectionRate Number of connections seen at the Type: integer dataProcessedByMonth Data processed by month is the total of bin and bout Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Member
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Member Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Member represents the backend member for a load balancer. It can be either a virtual server or a bare metal machine. Local address The IP address of a load balancer member. Type: string createDate Specifies when a load balancers Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Specifies when a load balancers Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_MemberHealth
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_MemberHealth Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_MemberHealth is a collection member metrics retrieved from a LBaaS VSI instance. The available metrics are: Name of the member Status of the member up or down Uuid of the member Local status Members status (UP/DOWN). Type: string uuid Members UUID. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_PolicyRule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_PolicyRule Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_PolicyRule This class contains layer 7 policy specifications and an array of associated rules An array of objects of this class must be passed to the API in order to create a policy and its associated rules. The layer 7 policy object An array of layer 7 rules Local l7Policy L7 Policy Type: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Policy

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Pool
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Pool Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Pool type presents a structure containing attributes of a load balancer pool such as the protocol, protocol port and the load balancing algorithm used. seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Listener Local createDate Create date of the pool instance Type: dateTime loadBalancingAlgorithm Load balancing algorithm: "ROUNDROBIN", "WEIGHTED_RR", "LEASTCONNECTION" Type: string modifyDate Last updated date of the pool Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_PoolMembersHealth
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_PoolMembersHealth Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_PoolMembersHealth provides statistics of members belonging to a particular pool. Local membersHealth Members statistics of the pool Type: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_MemberHealth[] poolUuid Instance uuid of the pool Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_SSLCipher
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_SSLCipher Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_SSLCipher type presents a structure that contains attributes of load balancer cipher suites. Local id Cipher identifier Type: integer name Name of the cipher Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_SessionAffinity
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_SessionAffinity Datatype Description SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_SessionAffinity represents the session affinity, aka session persistence, configuration for a load balancer backend pool. Local type Type of the session persistence Type: string Relational pool Type: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_Pool Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Account Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Account data type contains the properties for a single global load balancer account. The properties you are able to edit are fallbackIp, loadBalanceTypeId, and notes. The hosts relational property can be used for creating and editing hosts that belong to the global load balancer account. The [[SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Account::editObject|editObject]] method contains details on creating and edited hosts through the hosts relational property. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account::getGlobalLoadBalancerAccounts SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Account::getObject Local allowedNumberOfHosts The maximum number of hosts that a global load balancer account is allowed to have.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Host Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Host data type represents a single host that belongs to a global load balancer account’s load balancing pool. The destination IP address of a host must be one that belongs to your SoftLayer customer account, or to a datacenter load balancer virtual ip that belongs to your SoftLayer customer account. The destination IP address and port of a global load balancer host is a required field and must exist during creation and can not be removed.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Global_Type data type represents a single load balance method that can be assigned to a global load balancer account. The load balance method determines how hosts in a load balancing pool are chosen by the global load balancers. Local id The unique identifier of a load balance method. Type: integer name The name of a load balance method.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Service
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Service Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Service data type contains all the information relating to a specific service (destination) on a particular load balancer. Information retained on the object itself is the the source and destination of the service, routing type, weight, and whether or not the service is currently enabled. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Service::getObject Local connectionLimit Connection limit on this service. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress data type contains all the information relating to a specific load balancer assigned to a customer account. Information retained on the object itself is the virtual IP address, load balancing method, and any notes that are related to the load balancer. There is also an array of SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Service objects, which represent the load balancer services, explained more fully in the SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Service documentation.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Logging_Syslog
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Logging_Syslog Datatype Description The Syslog class holds a single line from the Networking Firewall “Syslog” record, for firewall detected and blocked attempts on a server. Local createDate Timestamp for when the connection was blocked by the firewall Type: dateTime destinationIpAddress The Destination IP Address of the blocked connection (your end) Type: string destinationPort The Destination Port of the blocked connection (your end) Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Account Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Account contains information regarding a transcode account. Local accountId The internal identifier of a SoftLayer account Type: integer createDate The created date Type: dateTime id The internal identifier of a transcode account Type: integer modifyDate The last modified date Type: dateTime Relational account The SoftLayer account information Type: SoftLayer_Account

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Job
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Job Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Job contains information regarding a transcode job such as input file, output format, user id and so on. Local autoDeleteDuration The auto-deletion duration in seconds. This value determines how long the input file will be kept on the storage. Type: integer byteIn The size of an input file in byte Type: integer createDate The created date Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Job_History
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Job_History Datatype Description Local createDate The creation date Type: dateTime publicNotes The note created by system Type: string transcodeJobId The internal identifier of a transcode job Type: integer Relational transcodeStatusName The status of a transcode job Type: string Count

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Job_Status Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Media_Transcode_Job_Status contains information on a transcode job status. Local description The description of a transcode job status Type: string id The internal identifier of a transcode job status Type: integer name The status name Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Message_Delivery Service Datatype Description Local accountId Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime password Type: string typeId Type: integer username Type: string vendorId Type: integer Relational account The SoftLayer customer account that a network message delivery account belongs to.

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Message_Delivery_Attribute Datatype Description Local value Type: string Relational networkMessageDelivery Type: SoftLayer_Network_Message_Delivery Count

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Message_Delivery_Vendor Datatype Description Local id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Incident
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Incident Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Incident data type models a single virtual server or physical hardware network monitoring event. SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Incidents are created when the SoftLayer monitoring system detects a service down on your hardware of virtual server. As the incident is resolved it’s status changes from “SERVICE FAILURE” to “COMPLETED”. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getNetworkMonitorIncidents SoftLayer_Hardware::getActiveNetworkMonitorIncident SoftLayer_Hardware::getLatestNetworkMonitorIncident SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::getNetworkMonitorIncidents SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::getActiveNetworkMonitorIncident SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::getLatestNetworkMonitorIncident Local status A network monitoring incident's status, either the string "

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host Service Datatype Description The Monitoring_Query_Host type represents a monitoring instance. It consists of a hardware ID to monitor, an IP address attached to that hardware ID, a method of monitoring, and what to do in the instance that the monitor ever fails. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host::findByHardwareId Local arg1Value The argument to be used for this monitor, if necessary. The lowest monitoring levels (like ping) ignore this setting, but higher levels like HTTP custom use it.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host_Stratum
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host_Stratum Service Datatype Description The monitoring stratum type stores the maximum level of the various components of the monitoring system that a particular hardware object has access to. This object cannot be accessed by ID, and cannot be modified. The user can access this object through Hardware_Server->availableMonitoring. There are two values on this object that are important: monitorLevel determines the highest level of SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Type object that can be placed in a monitoring instance on this server responseLevel determines the highest level of SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_ResponseType object that can be placed in a monitoring instance on this server Also note that the query type and response types are available through getAllQueryTypes and getAllResponseTypes, respectively.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_ResponseType
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_ResponseType Datatype Description The ResponseType type stores only an ID and a description of the response type. The only use for this object is in reference. The user chooses a response action that would be appropriate for a monitoring instance, and sets the ResponseTypeId to the SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host->responseActionId value. The user can retrieve all available ResponseTypes with the getAllObjects method on this service. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_ResponseType::getAllObjects Local actionDescription The description of the action the monitoring system will take on failure Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Result
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Result Datatype Description The monitoring result object is used to show the status of the actions taken by the monitoring system. In general, only the responseStatus variable is needed, as it holds the information on the status of the service. Local finishTime The timestamp of when this monitor was co Type: dateTime responseStatus The response status for this server. The response status meanings are: 0: Down/Critical: Server is down and/or has passed the critical response threshold (extremely long ping response, abnormal behavior, etc.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Type Datatype Description The MonitorType type stores a name, long description, and default arguments for the monitor types. The only use for this object is in reference. The user chooses a monitoring type that would be appropriate for their server, and sets the id of the Query_Type to SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host->queryTypeId The user can retrieve all available Query Types with the getAllObjects method on this service. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Type::getAllObjects Local argumentDescription The type of parameter sent to the monitoring command.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Pod
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Pod Service Datatype Description Local backendRouterId Identifier for this Pod's Backend Customer Router (BCR) Type: integer backendRouterName Host name of Pod's Backend Customer Router (BCR), e.g. bcr01a.dal09 Type: string capabilities Property providing a means to filter Pods based on available capabitilies. See [[SoftLayer_Network_Pod/getAllObjects]] to filter for Pods with specific capabilities. See [[SoftLayer_Network_Pod/getCapabilities]] to retrieve capabilities of a specific Pod.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Protection_Address
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Protection_Address Datatype Description Local departmentId Type: integer ipAddress Type: string managementMethodType Type: string Relational account Type: SoftLayer_Account location Type: SoftLayer_Location modifiedUser Type: SoftLayer_User_Employee primaryRouter Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Router serviceProvider Type: SoftLayer_Service_Provider

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Regional_Internet_Registry
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Regional_Internet_Registry Datatype Description Regional Internet Registries are the organizations who delegate IP address blocks to other groups or organizations around the Internet. The information contained in this data type is used throughout the networking-related services in our systems. Local id Unique ID of the object Type: integer keyName The system-level name of the registry Type: string name The friendly name of the registry Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup data type contains general information for a single security group. A security group contains a set of IP filter [[SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_Rule (type)|rules]] that define how to handle incoming (ingress) and outgoing (egress) traffic to both the public and private interfaces of a virtual server instance and a set of [[SoftLayer_Virtual_Network_SecurityGroup_NetworkComponentBinding (type)|bindings]] to associate virtual guest network components with the security group. Local createDate The date a security group was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_OrderBinding
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_OrderBinding Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_OrderBinding data type contains links between security groups and product orders. Local guestId The ID of the Virtual Guest associated with the security group. Type: integer id The unique ID for a security group, order, binding Type: integer orderId The ID of the order associated with the security group. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_Request Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_Request data type contains the ID of a specific request sent to the API. This ID is used to identify specific calls to attach and detach network components, as well as add, edit, and remove security group rules. Local requestId The unique ID for a request. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_RequestRules
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_RequestRules Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_RequestRules data type contains the ID of a specific request sent to the API, as well as an associative array of the rules that were created, edited, or removed by the request. Local requestId The unique ID for a request. Type: string rules Whether the API call was valid or not. Type: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_Rule[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_Rule Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup_Rule data type contains general information for a single rule that belongs to a [[SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup|security group]]. By default, all traffic (both inbound and outbound) to a virtual server instance is blocked. Security group rules are permissive, and define the allowed incoming (ingress) and outgoing (egress) traffic to both the public and private interfaces of a virtual server instance. The order of rules within a security group does not matter and priority always falls to the least restrictive rule.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request data type represents a single vulnerability scan request. It provides information on when the scan was created, last updated, and the current status. The status messages are as follows: *Scan Pending *Scan Processing *Scan Complete *Scan Cancelled *Generating Report. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request::getObject SoftLayer_Hardware::getSecurityScanRequests seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request_Status Local accountId A request's associated customer account identifier. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request_Status data type represents the current status of a vulnerability scan. The status messages are as follows: *Scan Pending *Scan Processing *Scan Complete *Scan Cancelled *Generating Report. The status of a vulnerability scan will change over the course of a scan’s execution. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request::getStatus seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Security_Scanner_Request Local id The identifier of a vulnerability scan's status. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health Datatype Description Many general services that SoftLayer provides are tracked on the customer portal with a quick status message. These status message provide users with a quick reference to the health of a service, whether it’s up or down. These services include SoftLayer’s Internet backbone connections, VPN entry points, and router networks. The SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health data type provides the relationship between these services and their health status.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Health_Status Datatype Description Many general services that SoftLayer provides are marked by a status message. These health messages give portal users a quick way of determining the state of a SoftLayer service. Services range from backbones to VPN endpoints and routers. Generally a health status is either “Up” or “Down”. Local name The status of a SoftLayer service. This is typically "Up" or "

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource is used to store information related to a service. It is used for determining the correct resource to connect to for a given service, like NAS, Evault, etc. Local backendIpAddress The backend IP address for this resource Type: string frontendIpAddress The frontend IP address for this resource Type: string id Type: integer

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource_Type Datatype Description Local type Type: string Relational serviceResources Type: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource[] Count serviceResourceCount A count of Type: unsignedLong

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Vpn_Overrides
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Vpn_Overrides Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Service_Vpn_Overrides data type contains information relating user ids to subnet ids when VPN access is manually configured. It is essentially an entry in a ‘white list’ of subnets a SoftLayer portal VPN user may access. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer::updateVPNUser Local id The internal identifier of the record. Type: integer subnetId The identifier of a subnet accessible by the SoftLayer portal VPN user.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage data type contains general information regarding a Storage product such as account id, access username and password, the Storage product type, and the server the Storage service is associated with. Currently, only EVault backup storage has an associated server. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getByUsername SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getObject SoftLayer_Account::getNetworkStorage SoftLayer_Account::getNasNetworkStorage SoftLayer_Account::getLockboxNetworkStorage SoftLayer_Account::getIscsiNetworkStorage SoftLayer_Account::getEvaultNetworkStorage SoftLayer_Account::getHubNetworkStorage SoftLayer_Hardware::getEvaultNetworkStorage seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup_Evault Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup contains general information regarding a Storage backup service such as account id, username, maximum capacity, password, Storage’s product type and the server id. Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup_Evault

Events provide an audit trail that can be used to verify that various tasks have occurred, such as snapshots to be created by a schedule or remote replication synchronization. Local createDate The date an event was created. Type: dateTime message The message text for an event.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi Service Datatype Description The iscsi data type provides access to additional information about an iscsi volume such as the snapshot capacity limit and replication partners. Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic_Version3
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic_Version3 Datatype Description The iscsi EqualLogic Version 3 data type provides access to additional information about an iscsi volume such as the available snapshot reserve space. Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic_Version3_Replicant
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic_Version3_Replicant Datatype Description An iscsi replicant receives incoming data from an associated iscsi volume. While the replicant is not in failover mode it will not be mountable. Upon failover the replicant can be mounted and used as a normal volume. It is suggested to only do this as part of a disaster recovery plan. Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic_Version3_Snapshot
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic_Version3_Snapshot Datatype Description An iscsi snapshot is a point-in-time view of the data on an associated iscsi volume. Iscsi snapshots use a copy-on-write technology to minimize the amount of snapshot space used. When a snapshot is initially created it will use no snapshot space. At the time data changes on a volume which existed when a snapshot was created the original data will be saved in the associated volume’s snapshot reserve space.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_OS_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_OS_Type Service Datatype Description Local createDate The date this OS type record was created. Type: dateTime description The description of this OS type Type: string id The internal identifier of the OS type selection Type: integer keyName The key name of this OS type Type: string name The name of this OS type Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_MassDataMigration_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_MassDataMigration_Request Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_MassDataMigration_Request data type contains information on a single Mass Data Migration request. Creation of these requests is limited to SoftLayer customers through the SoftLayer Customer Portal. Local accountId The account id of the request. Type: integer addressId The address id of address assigned to this request. Type: integer createUserId The create user id of the request.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_MassDataMigration_Request_DeviceConfiguration

Type: string id The unique id of the key contact.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas contains general information regarding a NAS Storage service such as account id, username, password, maximum capacity, Storage’s product type and capacity. Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_OpenStack_Object
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_OpenStack_Object Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_OpenStack_Object data type models OpenStack specific object storage objects. These storages authenticate through Keystone to access Swift. seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Storage Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Partnership
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Partnership Datatype Description A network storage partnership is used to link multiple volumes to each other. These partnerships describe replication hierarchies or link volume snapshots to their associated storage volume. Local createDate The date a partnership was created. Type: dateTime modifyDate The date a partnership was last modified. Type: dateTime partnerVolumeId The child volume id which a partnership is associated with.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Partnership_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Partnership_Type Datatype Description A network storage partnership type is used to define the link between two volumes. Local description A type's description, for example 'ISCSI snapshot partnership'. Type: string keyname A type's key name, for example 'ISCSI_SNAPSHOT'. Type: string name A type's name, for example 'ISCSI Snapshot'. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Property
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Property Datatype Description A property provides additional information about a volume which it is assigned to. This information can range from “Mountable” flags to utilized snapshot space. Local createDate The date a property was created. Type: dateTime modifyDate The date a property was last modified; Type: dateTime value The value of a property. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Property_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Property_Type Datatype Description The storage property types provide standard definitions for properties which can be used with any type for Storage offering. The properties provide additional information about a volume which they are assigned to. Local description A type's description, for example 'Determines whether the volume is currently mountable'. Type: string keyname A type's keyname, for example 'MOUNTABLE'. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Replicant
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Replicant Datatype Description Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created. Type: dateTime guestId The unique identification number of the guest associated with a Storage volume.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule Service Datatype Description Schedules can be created for select Storage services, such as iscsi. These schedules are used to perform various tasks such as scheduling snapshots or synchronizing replicants. Local active A flag which determines if a schedule is active. Type: integer createDate The date a schedule was created. Type: dateTime id A schedule's internal identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property Datatype Description Schedule properties provide attributes such as start date, end date, interval, and other properties to a storage schedule. Local createDate The date a schedule property was created. Type: dateTime id A schedule property's internal identifier. Type: integer modifyDate The date a schedule property was last modified. Type: dateTime typeId An identifier for the type of a property.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property_Type Service Datatype Description A schedule property type is used to allow for a standardized method of defining network storage schedules. Local description A type's description, for example 'Date for the schedule to start.'. Type: string id A schedule property type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyname A schedule property type's key name, for example 'START_DATE'. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Type Datatype Description A schedule type is used to define what a schedule was created to do. When creating a schedule to take snapshots of a volume, the ‘Snapshot’ schedule type would be used. Local id A schedule type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyname A schedule type's key name, for example 'SNAPSHOT'. Type: string name A schedule type's name, for example 'Snapshot'.

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Snapshot Datatype Description Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created. Type: dateTime guestId The unique identification number of the guest associated with a Storage volume.

Local description Human readable description for the associated SoftLayer_Network_Storage object. Type: string id ID which corresponds with storageTypeId on storage objects. Type: integer keyName Machine readable description code for the associated SoftLayer_Network_Storage object. Type: string Relational volumes The SoftLayer_Network_Storage object that uses this type.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Subnet data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer subnet. Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are assigned to the account only and not to users belonging to the account. External Links Subnetwork at Wikipedia RFC950:Internet Standard Subnetting Procedure at ietf.org Classless Inter-Domain Routing at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::findAllSubnetsAndActiveSwipTransactionStatus SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getObject SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getSubnetForIpAddress SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Swip_Transaction::getSubnet SoftLayer_Network_Vlan::getSubnets SoftLayer_Network_Vlan::getSecondarySubnets Local broadcastAddress The last IP address in a subnet is the subnet's broadcast address.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer IPv4 address. External Links Ip address at Wikipedia RFC791: Internet Protocol Specification at ietf.org associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::getObject SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::editObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Vlan SoftLayer_Network_Subnet SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Version6 Local id An IP's internal identifier. Type: integer ipAddress An IP address expressed in dotted quad format.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Global
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Global Service Datatype Description Local description A Global IP Address' associated description Type: integer destinationIpAddressId A Global IP Address' associated [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress|ipAddress]] ID Type: integer id A Global IP Address' unique identifier Type: integer ipAddressId A Global IP Address' associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] ID Type: integer typeId A Global IP Address' associated type [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Global_Type|id]] ID Type: integer
